DataElement.preferredName: Quality Of Life Patient Not Assessed Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a specified reason, not otherwise listed, as to why the quality of life (QOL) was not assessed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Quality of Life Patient Not Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the quality of life assessment of a patient not being taken.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.:A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not; used for negation of a word or group of words.:Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the specified free-text field related to quality of life.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
